CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This smaller roughness of the blend film indicates that the domain size of the phase separation of the donor - acceptor interpenetrating network could be reduced , which could be beneficial for the exciton charge separation and charge transport.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| blend film |
| donor - acceptor interpenetrating network |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| blend film (the material that has the smaller roughness) |
| donor - acceptor interpenetrating network (the phase that is undergoing phase separation in the blend film) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This smaller roughness of the blend film indicates that the domain size of the phase separation of the donor - acceptor interpenetrating network could be reduced , which could be beneficial for the exciton charge separation and charge transport.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| smaller roughness of the blend film |
| domain size of the phase separation |
| size of the donor - acceptor interpenetrating network |
| exciton charge separation |
| charge transport. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| smaller roughness of the blend film |
| domain size of the phase separation |
| size of the donor - acceptor interpenetrating network |
| exciton charge separation |
| charge transport. |

Explanation:

* "This" and "could be beneficial for" are not material properties.
* "smaller roughness of the blend film" and "size of the donor - acceptor interpenetrating network" are material properties.
* "domain size of the phase separation" is a material property that describes the size of the separated phases in a material.
* "exciton charge separation" and "charge transport" are material properties related to the behavior of charge carriers in a material.
